TheSimpletonMod:CardInJarMayhem.NAME: Captured Mayhem
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add a #yMayhem to your hand.

TheSimpletonMod:CashCrop.NAME: Cash Crop
DESCRIPTIONS: Each time you #yHarvest a #yCrop that you haven't harvested yet this combat, gain #b
Gold.

TheSimpletonMod:GrassPellets.NAME: Grass Pellets
TheSimpletonMod:GrassPellets.FLAVOR: Sometimes you have to take the lawn view.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you #yHarvest one or more #yCrop stacks #b
times in a single turn, remove all of your debuffs.

TheSimpletonMod:GardenGlove.NAME: Gardening Glove
TheSimpletonMod:GardenGlove.FLAVOR: Sometimes you need to get into the dirt.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, if you have exactly one #yPower card in hand, retain it.

TheSimpletonMod:GasCan.NAME: Gas Can
TheSimpletonMod:GasCan.FLAVOR: What can expand to fill any container?
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply #yBurning, apply half that amount to each other enemy.

TheSimpletonMod:GourdCharm.NAME: Gourd Charm
TheSimpletonMod:GourdCharm.FLAVOR: Prized by adventurers who prefer Hard Mode.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, if you have no crops, #yPlant #b2 #ySquash.

TheSimpletonMod:TheHarvester.NAME: Trusty Trowel
TheSimpletonMod:TheHarvester.FLAVOR: Every decent gardener needs a good blade.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yPlant a #yCrop, if you then have more stacks than its #rMaturity level, #gHarvest all excess stacks.

TheSimpletonMod:HeatStroke.NAME: Heat Stroke
TheSimpletonMod:HeatStroke.FLAVOR: First the fever, then the chills.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b
#yBurning at the start of the next combat.

TheSimpletonMod:Honeycomb.NAME: Honeycomb
TheSimpletonMod:Honeycomb.FLAVOR: It's going to sting a little.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yPlant a #yCrop, deal #b
damage to a random enemy.

TheSimpletonMod:HornOfPlenty.NAME: Horn Of Plenty
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add a random in-season #yCrop Power card to your hand. Then gain #b
#yAbundance which lasts until end of turn.

TheSimpletonMod:HotPotato.NAME: Hot Potato
DESCRIPTIONS: Harvesting #yPotatoes now yields #yFlaming #ySpuds, which also apply #yBurning damage.

TheSimpletonMod:Moonshine.NAME: Jug of Moonshine
TheSimpletonMod:Moonshine.FLAVOR: A little taste will soothe the nerves when your spirits are low. But it's rough on the gut.
DESCRIPTIONS: On turn #b
, gain #b

TheSimpletonMod:OnionBelt.NAME: Onion Belt
TheSimpletonMod:OnionBelt.FLAVOR: Once wielded proudly by the Elders, these are now largely out of style.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, if you have no crops, #yPlant #b2 #yOnions.

TheSimpletonMod:PicklingJar.NAME: Pickling Jar
TheSimpletonMod:PicklingJar.FLAVOR: Sour, salty, and full of dark magic.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose a card. Every #b
times you shuffle your draw pile, add a copy of that card to your hand. It costs 0 that turn.

TheSimpletonMod:PlanterBox.NAME: Planter Box
TheSimpletonMod:PlanterBox.FLAVOR: Imported soil tends to produce a less twisted harvest.

TheSimpletonMod:NightSoil.NAME: Night Soil
TheSimpletonMod:NightSoil.FLAVOR: Raw material for those who dabble in the arts of life and death.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you shuffle your deck, for each of your #yCrops that isn't #rMature, #yPlant #b
more.
more.

TheSimpletonMod:SpudOfTheInnocent.NAME: Spud of the Innocent
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, if you have no crops, #yPlant #b
#yPotatoes.

TheSimpletonMod:SpudOfTheMartyr.NAME: Spud of the Martyr
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you lose HP in combat, gain #b
temporary #yStrength the following turn.

TheSimpletonMod:Trowel.NAME: Trowel
DESCRIPTIONS: Attack damage you receive is reduced by the number of #yPotato stacks you have.

TheSimpletonMod:WoodChipper.NAME: Weed Puller
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, choose up to #b
cards from your hand to exhaust, then draw that many.
